thread.title: WATCH: Elderly couple and dog rescued from mobile home inferno
thread.title_full: WATCH: Elderly couple and dog rescued from mobile home inferno

author: Sophie Pendrill
title: WATCH: Elderly couple and dog rescued from mobile home inferno
text:
NORTH FORT MYERS, Fla. (CBS12) â€” Deputies fought through the flames that engulfed a North Fort Myers mobile home to save a trapped elderly couple and their dog.
The Lee County Sheriff's Office (LCSO) said that late Tuesday night, deputies responded to a fully engulfed mobile home fire in North Fort Myers.
When deputies arrived on the scene, they reported finding an elderly couple and their dog were trapped inside, struggling to escape the flames.
See also: Man saves co-worker from sinking truck in Jacksonville pond
According to LCSO, the deputies rushed into the burning home and carried the couple and their pet to safety.
The couple was transported to a nearby hospital with non-life-threatening injuries and are now on the road to recovery.
